title: Pogumidam Vegu Thooramillai
overview: The narrative unfolds the transformative journey of a mortuary driver whose life's circumstances drive him to embark on a lengthy expedition to transport a deceased individual. Little did he know that the deceased carried the pride and honour of two feuding families. As the journey progresses, themes of friendship, love, clashes, and confusions come to the forefront. The question of how he successfully manages to deliver the body to its rightful family amidst the chaos is what Pogumidam Veguthooramillai is all about.
